title: NETWORK_GET_LOCAL_SCENE_FROM_NETWORK_ID
content:
0x02C40BF885C567B60x16AED87B// NetworkGetLocalSceneFromNetworkId
int NETWORK_GET_LOCAL_SCENE_FROM_NETWORK_ID(int netSceneId);Parameters:netSceneId: Network synchronised scene ID (returned by NETWORK_CREATE_SYNCHRONISED_SCENE).Returns: Local synchronized scene ID. This value can be used with natives such as: GET_SYNCHRONIZED_SCENE_PHASE, GET_SYNCHRONIZED_SCENE_RATE, IS_SYNCHRONIZED_SCENE_RUNNING and more.Returns a local synchronized scene handle of a networked synchronised scene.Old name:  _NETWORK_UNLINK_NETWORKED_SYNCHRONISED_SCENEOld name:  _NETWORK_CONVERT_SYNCHRONISED_SCENE_TO_SYNCHRONIZED_SCENE
